EmailTemplate.description: Case status has been changed to Pending Closure and Closure Status is Started
EmailTemplate.name: Case Closure Process Started
EmailTemplate.subject: You have a Query pending your feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
We have just added a reply to your case, with number {!Case.CaseNumber}. You can go to case details to view the reply. Has your query been resolved?
You can let us know by accessing the query in the IATA Customer Portal.
